title.rendered: “Ensuring Security and Welfare: IDF’s Response to Detention Facility Complaints & Changes in 2022”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Following the remarks of the State Comptroller, the IDF employs all means to ensure the security and welfare of its personnel. In the military detention facilities, there are commanders who enforce the regulations and conditions of detention.
The figure of 38% of complaints refers to complaints from the past (2022) from female soldiers who served in the Military Police Corps, and this model has been discontinued.
The IDF acknowledges two exceptional events at the detention facility in Sde Teiman during the war, which were dealt with immediately.
The imprisonment of prisoners in military facilities is only temporary. In general, the Military Police Corps is the national prison authority, and from its responsibility, it enforces the imprisonment of the terrorists.
